title: Shroud Of Turin Video on YouTube
post: I would like to contact the Centro Portugués de Sindonología. I read Maria´s recent comment in the mail about the Sindone. I belong to the Spanish Center, CES and EDOCES (about the Oviedo Sudarium)
author: MANUEL M. CARREIRA, S.J.
